article_title: Chrysler Seeks New Trial in Georgia Jeep Fire Case
article_text:
Chrysler asked a Georgia judge for a new trial after a jury awarded the family of a 4-year-old boy $150 million of legal damages on account of his death in a fiery rear-end Jeep crash.

Chrysler said the jury’s “stunning and unprecedented damage awards are grossly excessive and cannot stand,” in a court filing Thursday.

The auto maker said...
